drinkName.name: Rooster-Tail
drinkName.about: This raspberry-and-mint tipple is delicious all year round.

ingredients.ingredient: Peach brandy (not peach liqueur; may substitute 1.5 oz bonded applejack and .5 oz peach liqueur)

mix.how: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.
Shake, and strain into a small goblet filled with fresh cracked ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a raspberry or two.
